alert.note: Alert for Grand Forks; Nelson (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 1:12PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Grand Forks and southeastern Nelson Counties through 200 PM CDT... At 111 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kempton, or 27 miles west of Grand Forks, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Northwood around 115 PM CDT. Arvilla around 120 PM CDT. Emerado around 130 PM CDT. Holmes around 135 PM CDT. Merrifield, Grand Forks and Thompson around 150 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Grand Forks Airport. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 124 and 144. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
